title: 求助，我的Minecraft出了什么问题
author: huangqi416
txt_content:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/main/Main
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.client.main.Main
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247)


系统为OS X10.10.2

replies.author: player_play
replies.txt_content: 看着一概是调用数据的问题，建议下载JAVA8并重装。话说楼上我认识你，你不就占我沙发的那位嘛~

replies.author: player_play
replies.txt_content:
player_play 发表于 2015-1-29 09:12

replies.txt_content: 我猜，，是游戏文件问题，，重新下载游戏试试

replies.author: player_play
replies.txt_content:
Dota_te 发表于 2015-1-29 10:37
java8？ mojang不是不支持吗
mojang支持JAVA8，你去翻翻新闻贴，大概是1.7.2那会儿的，上面写JAVA8会更好地支持MINECRAFT，所以要更新啊
